text.tspan: Number of people without access to an improved drinking water source,
An improved drinking water source includes piped water on premises (piped household water connection located inside the
userâ€™s dwelling, plot or yard), and other improved drinking water sources (public taps or standpipes, tube wells or boreholes,
protected dug wells, protected springs, and rainwater collection).
Source: Our World in Data based on World Bank, World Development Indicators
